I've been told by two sources that Mr Ian Edmondson has evidence himself that might implicate other senior people at the News of the World, so clearly this has opened a whole can of worms, he said. The new Met inquiry follows the resignation last week of Prime Minister David Cameron 's official spokesman Andy Coulson , who said the media storm surrounding ongoing hacking claims had distracted him from his work.
